furi_hal_nfc_iso15693.c

1#include "furi_hal_nfc_i.h"
2#include "furi_hal_nfc_tech_i.h"
3
4#include <digital_signal/presets/nfc/iso15693_signal.h>
5#include <signal_reader/parsers/iso15693/iso15693_parser.h>
6
7#include <furi_hal_resources.h>
8
9#define FURI_HAL_NFC_ISO15693_MAX_FRAME_SIZE (1024U)
10#define FURI_HAL_NFC_ISO15693_POLLER_MAX_BUFFER_SIZE (64)
11
12#define FURI_HAL_NFC_ISO15693_RESP_SOF_SIZE (5)
13#define FURI_HAL_NFC_ISO15693_RESP_EOF_SIZE (5)
14#define FURI_HAL_NFC_ISO15693_RESP_SOF_MASK (0x1FU)
15#define FURI_HAL_NFC_ISO15693_RESP_SOF_PATTERN (0x17U)
16#define FURI_HAL_NFC_ISO15693_RESP_EOF_PATTERN (0x1DU)
17
18#define FURI_HAL_NFC_ISO15693_RESP_PATTERN_MASK (0x03U)
19#define FURI_HAL_NFC_ISO15693_RESP_PATTERN_0 (0x01U)
20#define FURI_HAL_NFC_ISO15693_RESP_PATTERN_1 (0x02U)
21
22// Derived experimentally
23#define FURI_HAL_NFC_ISO15693_POLLER_FWT_COMP_FC (-1300)
24#define FURI_HAL_NFC_ISO15693_LISTENER_FDT_COMP_FC (2850)
25
26#define BITS_IN_BYTE (8U)
27
28#define TAG "FuriHalIso15693"
29
30typedef struct {
31 Iso15693Signal* signal;
32 Iso15693Parser* parser;
33} FuriHalNfcIso15693Listener;
34
35typedef struct {
36 // 4 bits per data bit on transmit
37 uint8_t fifo_buf[FURI_HAL_NFC_ISO15693_POLLER_MAX_BUFFER_SIZE * 4];
38 size_t fifo_buf_bits;
39 uint8_t frame_buf[FURI_HAL_NFC_ISO15693_POLLER_MAX_BUFFER_SIZE * 2];
40 size_t frame_buf_bits;
41} FuriHalNfcIso15693Poller;
42
43static FuriHalNfcIso15693Listener* furi_hal_nfc_iso15693_listener = NULL;
44static FuriHalNfcIso15693Poller* furi_hal_nfc_iso15693_poller = NULL;
45
46static FuriHalNfcIso15693Listener* furi_hal_nfc_iso15693_listener_alloc() {
47 FuriHalNfcIso15693Listener* instance = malloc(sizeof(FuriHalNfcIso15693Listener));
48
49 instance->signal = iso15693_signal_alloc(&gpio_spi_r_mosi);
50 instance->parser =
51 iso15693_parser_alloc(&gpio_nfc_irq_rfid_pull, FURI_HAL_NFC_ISO15693_MAX_FRAME_SIZE);
52
53 return instance;
54}
55
56static void furi_hal_nfc_iso15693_listener_free(FuriHalNfcIso15693Listener* instance) {
57 furi_assert(instance);
58
59 iso15693_signal_free(instance->signal);
60 iso15693_parser_free(instance->parser);
61
62 free(instance);
63}

65static FuriHalNfcIso15693Poller* furi_hal_nfc_iso15693_poller_alloc() {
66 FuriHalNfcIso15693Poller* instance = malloc(sizeof(FuriHalNfcIso15693Poller));
67
68 return instance;
69}
70
71static void furi_hal_nfc_iso15693_poller_free(FuriHalNfcIso15693Poller* instance) {
72 furi_assert(instance);
73
74 free(instance);
75}

77static FuriHalNfcError furi_hal_nfc_iso15693_common_init(FuriHalSpiBusHandle* handle) {
78 // Common NFC-V settings, 26.48 kbps
79
80 // 1st stage zero = 12 kHz, 3rd stage zero = 80 kHz, low-pass = 600 kHz
81 st25r3916_write_reg(
82 handle,
83 ST25R3916_REG_RX_CONF1,
84 ST25R3916_REG_RX_CONF1_z12k | ST25R3916_REG_RX_CONF1_h80 |
85 ST25R3916_REG_RX_CONF1_lp_600khz);
86
87 // Enable AGC
88 // AGC Ratio 6
89 // AGC algorithm with RESET (recommended for ISO15693)
90 // AGC operation during complete receive period
91 // Squelch automatic activation on TX end
92 st25r3916_write_reg(
93 handle,
94 ST25R3916_REG_RX_CONF2,
95 ST25R3916_REG_RX_CONF2_agc6_3 | ST25R3916_REG_RX_CONF2_agc_m |
96 ST25R3916_REG_RX_CONF2_agc_en | ST25R3916_REG_RX_CONF2_sqm_dyn);
97
98 // HF operation, full gain on AM and PM channels
99 st25r3916_write_reg(handle, ST25R3916_REG_RX_CONF3, 0x00);
100 // No gain reduction on AM and PM channels
101 st25r3916_write_reg(handle, ST25R3916_REG_RX_CONF4, 0x00);
102
103 // Collision detection level 53%
104 // AM & PM summation before digitizing on
105 st25r3916_write_reg(
106 handle,
107 ST25R3916_REG_CORR_CONF1,
108 ST25R3916_REG_CORR_CONF1_corr_s0 | ST25R3916_REG_CORR_CONF1_corr_s1 |
109 ST25R3916_REG_CORR_CONF1_corr_s4);
110 // 424 kHz subcarrier stream mode on
111 st25r3916_write_reg(handle, ST25R3916_REG_CORR_CONF2, ST25R3916_REG_CORR_CONF2_corr_s8);
112 return FuriHalNfcErrorNone;
113}
114
115static FuriHalNfcError furi_hal_nfc_iso15693_poller_init(FuriHalSpiBusHandle* handle) {
116 furi_assert(furi_hal_nfc_iso15693_poller == NULL);
117
118 furi_hal_nfc_iso15693_poller = furi_hal_nfc_iso15693_poller_alloc();
119
120 // Enable Subcarrier Stream mode, OOK modulation
121 st25r3916_change_reg_bits(
122 handle,
123 ST25R3916_REG_MODE,
124 ST25R3916_REG_MODE_om_mask | ST25R3916_REG_MODE_tr_am,
125 ST25R3916_REG_MODE_om_subcarrier_stream | ST25R3916_REG_MODE_tr_am_ook);
126
127 // Subcarrier 424 kHz mode
128 // 8 sub-carrier pulses in report period
129 st25r3916_write_reg(
130 handle,
131 ST25R3916_REG_STREAM_MODE,
132 ST25R3916_REG_STREAM_MODE_scf_sc424 | ST25R3916_REG_STREAM_MODE_stx_106 |
133 ST25R3916_REG_STREAM_MODE_scp_8pulses);
134
135 // Use regulator AM, resistive AM disabled
136 st25r3916_clear_reg_bits(
137 handle,
138 ST25R3916_REG_AUX_MOD,
139 ST25R3916_REG_AUX_MOD_dis_reg_am | ST25R3916_REG_AUX_MOD_res_am);
140
141 return furi_hal_nfc_iso15693_common_init(handle);
142}
143
144static FuriHalNfcError furi_hal_nfc_iso15693_poller_deinit(FuriHalSpiBusHandle* handle) {
145 UNUSED(handle);
146 furi_assert(furi_hal_nfc_iso15693_poller);
147
148 furi_hal_nfc_iso15693_poller_free(furi_hal_nfc_iso15693_poller);
149 furi_hal_nfc_iso15693_poller = NULL;
150
151 return FuriHalNfcErrorNone;
152}
153
154static void iso15693_3_poller_encode_frame(
155 const uint8_t* tx_data,
156 size_t tx_bits,
157 uint8_t* frame_buf,
158 size_t frame_buf_size,
159 size_t* frame_buf_bits) {
160 static const uint8_t bit_patterns_1_out_of_4[] = {0x02, 0x08, 0x20, 0x80};
161 size_t frame_buf_size_calc = (tx_bits / 2) + 2;
162 furi_assert(frame_buf_size >= frame_buf_size_calc);
163
164 // Add SOF 1 out of 4
165 frame_buf[0] = 0x21;
166
167 size_t byte_pos = 1;
168 for(size_t i = 0; i < tx_bits / BITS_IN_BYTE; ++i) {
169 for(size_t j = 0; j < BITS_IN_BYTE; j += (BITS_IN_BYTE) / 4) {
170 const uint8_t bit_pair = (tx_data[i] >> j) & 0x03;
171 frame_buf[byte_pos++] = bit_patterns_1_out_of_4[bit_pair];
172 }
173 }
174 // Add EOF
175 frame_buf[byte_pos++] = 0x04;
176 *frame_buf_bits = byte_pos * BITS_IN_BYTE;
177}
178
179static FuriHalNfcError iso15693_3_poller_decode_frame(
180 const uint8_t* buf,
181 size_t buf_bits,
182 uint8_t* buf_decoded,
183 size_t buf_decoded_size,
184 size_t* buf_decoded_bits) {
185 FuriHalNfcError ret = FuriHalNfcErrorDataFormat;
186 size_t bit_pos = 0;
187 memset(buf_decoded, 0, buf_decoded_size);
188
189 do {
190 if(buf_bits == 0) break;
191 // Check SOF
192 if((buf[0] & FURI_HAL_NFC_ISO15693_RESP_SOF_MASK) !=
193 FURI_HAL_NFC_ISO15693_RESP_SOF_PATTERN)
194 break;
195
196 if(buf_bits == BITS_IN_BYTE) {
197 ret = FuriHalNfcErrorIncompleteFrame;
198 break;
199 }
200
201 // 2 response bits = 1 data bit
202 for(uint32_t i = FURI_HAL_NFC_ISO15693_RESP_SOF_SIZE;
203 i < buf_bits - FURI_HAL_NFC_ISO15693_RESP_SOF_SIZE;
204 i += BITS_IN_BYTE / 4) {
205 const size_t byte_index = i / BITS_IN_BYTE;
206 const size_t bit_offset = i % BITS_IN_BYTE;
207 const uint8_t resp_byte = (buf[byte_index] >> bit_offset) |
208 (buf[byte_index + 1] << (BITS_IN_BYTE - bit_offset));
209
210 // Check EOF
211 if(resp_byte == FURI_HAL_NFC_ISO15693_RESP_EOF_PATTERN) {
212 ret = FuriHalNfcErrorNone;
213 break;
214 }
215
216 const uint8_t bit_pattern = resp_byte & FURI_HAL_NFC_ISO15693_RESP_PATTERN_MASK;
217
218 if(bit_pattern == FURI_HAL_NFC_ISO15693_RESP_PATTERN_0) {
219 bit_pos++;
220 } else if(bit_pattern == FURI_HAL_NFC_ISO15693_RESP_PATTERN_1) {
221 buf_decoded[bit_pos / BITS_IN_BYTE] |= 1 << (bit_pos % BITS_IN_BYTE);
222 bit_pos++;
223 } else {
224 break;
225 }
226 if(bit_pos / BITS_IN_BYTE > buf_decoded_size) {
227 break;
228 }
229 }
230
231 } while(false);
232
233 if(ret == FuriHalNfcErrorNone) {
234 *buf_decoded_bits = bit_pos;
235 }
236
237 return ret;
238}
239
240static FuriHalNfcError furi_hal_nfc_iso15693_poller_tx(
241 FuriHalSpiBusHandle* handle,
242 const uint8_t* tx_data,
243 size_t tx_bits) {
244 FuriHalNfcIso15693Poller* instance = furi_hal_nfc_iso15693_poller;
245 iso15693_3_poller_encode_frame(
246 tx_data,
247 tx_bits,
248 instance->frame_buf,
249 sizeof(instance->frame_buf),
250 &instance->frame_buf_bits);
251 return furi_hal_nfc_poller_tx_common(handle, instance->frame_buf, instance->frame_buf_bits);
252}
253
254static FuriHalNfcError furi_hal_nfc_iso15693_poller_rx(
255 FuriHalSpiBusHandle* handle,
256 uint8_t* rx_data,
257 size_t rx_data_size,
258 size_t* rx_bits) {
259 FuriHalNfcError error = FuriHalNfcErrorNone;
260 FuriHalNfcIso15693Poller* instance = furi_hal_nfc_iso15693_poller;
261
262 do {
263 error = furi_hal_nfc_common_fifo_rx(
264 handle, instance->fifo_buf, sizeof(instance->fifo_buf), &instance->fifo_buf_bits);
265 if(error != FuriHalNfcErrorNone) break;
266
267 error = iso15693_3_poller_decode_frame(
268 instance->fifo_buf,
269 instance->fifo_buf_bits,
270 instance->frame_buf,
271 sizeof(instance->frame_buf),
272 &instance->frame_buf_bits);
273 if(error != FuriHalNfcErrorNone) break;
274
275 if(rx_data_size < instance->frame_buf_bits / BITS_IN_BYTE) {
276 error = FuriHalNfcErrorBufferOverflow;
277 break;
278 }
279
280 memcpy(rx_data, instance->frame_buf, instance->frame_buf_bits / BITS_IN_BYTE);
281 *rx_bits = instance->frame_buf_bits;
282 } while(false);
283
284 return error;
285}
286
287static void furi_hal_nfc_iso15693_listener_transparent_mode_enter(FuriHalSpiBusHandle* handle) {
288 st25r3916_direct_cmd(handle, ST25R3916_CMD_TRANSPARENT_MODE);
289
290 furi_hal_spi_bus_handle_deinit(handle);
291 furi_hal_nfc_deinit_gpio_isr();
292}
293
294static void furi_hal_nfc_iso15693_listener_transparent_mode_exit(FuriHalSpiBusHandle* handle) {
295 // Configure gpio back to SPI and exit transparent mode
296 furi_hal_nfc_init_gpio_isr();
297 furi_hal_spi_bus_handle_init(handle);
298
299 st25r3916_direct_cmd(handle, ST25R3916_CMD_UNMASK_RECEIVE_DATA);
300}
301
302static FuriHalNfcError furi_hal_nfc_iso15693_listener_init(FuriHalSpiBusHandle* handle) {
303 furi_assert(furi_hal_nfc_iso15693_listener == NULL);
304
305 furi_hal_nfc_iso15693_listener = furi_hal_nfc_iso15693_listener_alloc();
306
307 // Set default operation mode
308 st25r3916_change_reg_bits(
309 handle,
310 ST25R3916_REG_MODE,
311 ST25R3916_REG_MODE_om_mask | ST25R3916_REG_MODE_tr_am,
312 ST25R3916_REG_MODE_om_targ_nfca | ST25R3916_REG_MODE_tr_am_ook);
313
314 st25r3916_change_reg_bits(
315 handle,
316 ST25R3916_REG_OP_CONTROL,
317 ST25R3916_REG_OP_CONTROL_rx_en,
318 ST25R3916_REG_OP_CONTROL_rx_en);
319
320 // Enable passive target mode
321 st25r3916_change_reg_bits(
322 handle, ST25R3916_REG_MODE, ST25R3916_REG_MODE_targ, ST25R3916_REG_MODE_targ_targ);
323
324 FuriHalNfcError error = furi_hal_nfc_iso15693_common_init(handle);
325
326 furi_hal_nfc_iso15693_listener_transparent_mode_enter(handle);
327
328 return error;
329}
330
331static FuriHalNfcError furi_hal_nfc_iso15693_listener_deinit(FuriHalSpiBusHandle* handle) {
332 furi_assert(furi_hal_nfc_iso15693_listener);
333
334 furi_hal_nfc_iso15693_listener_transparent_mode_exit(handle);
335
336 furi_hal_nfc_iso15693_listener_free(furi_hal_nfc_iso15693_listener);
337 furi_hal_nfc_iso15693_listener = NULL;
338
339 return FuriHalNfcErrorNone;
340}
341
342static FuriHalNfcError
343 furi_hal_nfc_iso15693_listener_tx_transparent(const uint8_t* data, size_t data_size) {
344 iso15693_signal_tx(
345 furi_hal_nfc_iso15693_listener->signal, Iso15693SignalDataRateHi, data, data_size);
346
347 return FuriHalNfcErrorNone;
348}
349
350static void furi_hal_nfc_iso15693_parser_callback(Iso15693ParserEvent event, void* context) {
351 furi_assert(context);
352
353 if(event == Iso15693ParserEventDataReceived) {
354 FuriThreadId thread_id = context;
355 furi_thread_flags_set(thread_id, FuriHalNfcEventInternalTypeTransparentDataReceived);
356 }
357}
358
359static FuriHalNfcEvent furi_hal_nfc_iso15693_wait_event(uint32_t timeout_ms) {
360 FuriHalNfcEvent event = 0;
361
362 FuriThreadId thread_id = furi_thread_get_current_id();
363 iso15693_parser_start(
364 furi_hal_nfc_iso15693_listener->parser, furi_hal_nfc_iso15693_parser_callback, thread_id);
365
366 while(true) {
367 uint32_t flag = furi_thread_flags_wait(
368 FuriHalNfcEventInternalTypeAbort | FuriHalNfcEventInternalTypeTransparentDataReceived,
369 FuriFlagWaitAny,
370 timeout_ms);
371 furi_thread_flags_clear(flag);
372
373 if(flag & FuriHalNfcEventInternalTypeAbort) {
374 event = FuriHalNfcEventAbortRequest;
375 break;
376 }
377 if(flag & FuriHalNfcEventInternalTypeTransparentDataReceived) {
378 if(iso15693_parser_run(furi_hal_nfc_iso15693_listener->parser)) {
379 event = FuriHalNfcEventRxEnd;
380 break;
381 }
382 }
383 }
384 iso15693_parser_stop(furi_hal_nfc_iso15693_listener->parser);
385
386 return event;
387}
388
389static FuriHalNfcError furi_hal_nfc_iso15693_listener_tx(
390 FuriHalSpiBusHandle* handle,
391 const uint8_t* tx_data,
392 size_t tx_bits) {
393 UNUSED(handle);
394 furi_assert(furi_hal_nfc_iso15693_listener);
395
396 FuriHalNfcError error = FuriHalNfcErrorNone;
397
398 error = furi_hal_nfc_iso15693_listener_tx_transparent(tx_data, tx_bits / BITS_IN_BYTE);
399
400 return error;
401}
402
403FuriHalNfcError furi_hal_nfc_iso15693_listener_tx_sof() {
404 iso15693_signal_tx_sof(furi_hal_nfc_iso15693_listener->signal, Iso15693SignalDataRateHi);
405
406 return FuriHalNfcErrorNone;
407}
408
409static FuriHalNfcError furi_hal_nfc_iso15693_listener_rx(
410 FuriHalSpiBusHandle* handle,
411 uint8_t* rx_data,
412 size_t rx_data_size,
413 size_t* rx_bits) {
414 furi_assert(furi_hal_nfc_iso15693_listener);
415 UNUSED(handle);
416
417 if(rx_data_size <
418 iso15693_parser_get_data_size_bytes(furi_hal_nfc_iso15693_listener->parser)) {
419 return FuriHalNfcErrorBufferOverflow;
420 }
421
422 iso15693_parser_get_data(
423 furi_hal_nfc_iso15693_listener->parser, rx_data, rx_data_size, rx_bits);
424
425 return FuriHalNfcErrorNone;
426}
427
428FuriHalNfcError furi_hal_nfc_iso15693_listener_sleep(FuriHalSpiBusHandle* handle) {
429 UNUSED(handle);
430
431 return FuriHalNfcErrorNone;
432}
433
434const FuriHalNfcTechBase furi_hal_nfc_iso15693 = {
435 .poller =
436 {
437 .compensation =
438 {
439 .fdt = FURI_HAL_NFC_POLLER_FDT_COMP_FC,
440 .fwt = FURI_HAL_NFC_ISO15693_POLLER_FWT_COMP_FC,
441 },
442 .init = furi_hal_nfc_iso15693_poller_init,
443 .deinit = furi_hal_nfc_iso15693_poller_deinit,
444 .wait_event = furi_hal_nfc_wait_event_common,
445 .tx = furi_hal_nfc_iso15693_poller_tx,
446 .rx = furi_hal_nfc_iso15693_poller_rx,
447 },
448
449 .listener =
450 {
451 .compensation =
452 {
453 .fdt = FURI_HAL_NFC_ISO15693_LISTENER_FDT_COMP_FC,
454 },
455 .init = furi_hal_nfc_iso15693_listener_init,
456 .deinit = furi_hal_nfc_iso15693_listener_deinit,
457 .wait_event = furi_hal_nfc_iso15693_wait_event,
458 .tx = furi_hal_nfc_iso15693_listener_tx,
459 .rx = furi_hal_nfc_iso15693_listener_rx,
460 .sleep = furi_hal_nfc_iso15693_listener_sleep,
461 .idle = furi_hal_nfc_iso15693_listener_sleep,
462 },
463};
